feed.title: 白罴

entry.title: rails-restful
entry.content:
HTTP Verb GET POST PUT DELETE
groups_path (http://localhost:3000/groups) index action create action
group_path(group) (http://localhost:3000/groups[id]) show action update action destroy action
edit_group_path(group) (http://localhost:3000/groups[:id]/eidt) edit action
new_group_path (http://localhost:3000/groups/new) new action
  • index
  def index
    @groups = Group.all
  end
  • show
  def show
    @group = Group.find(params[:id])
  end
  • edit
  def edit
    @group = Group.find(params[:id])
  end
  • new
  def new
  	@group = Group.new
  end
  • create
  def create
    @group = Group.new(group_params)
    @group.save
    
    redirect_to groups_path
  end
  • update
  def update
    @group = Group.find(params[:id])
    @group.update(group_params)
    redirect_to groups_path, notice: "Update Success"
  end
  • destory
  def destroy
  	@group = Group.find(params[:id])
  	@group.destroy
  	flash[:alert] = "Group deleted"
  	redirect_to groups_path
  end
  • private
  def group_params
    params.require(:group).permit(:title, :description)
  end

entry.title: rails-json-router
entry.content:
rails-json-router

  • GET /trains

  • GET /trains/{列车编号}

  • 增- POST /reservations/{订票号码}

  • 删-DELETE /reservations/{订票号码}

  • 改-PATCH /reservations/{订票号码}

  • 查-GET /reservations/{订票号码}

Rails.application.routes.draw do
  namespace :api, :defaults => { :format => :json } do
    namespace :v1 do
      get "/trains"  => "trains#index", :as => :trains
      get "/trains/:train_number" => "trains#show", :as => :train

      post "/reservations" => "reservations#create", :as => :create_reservations
      delete "/reservations/:booking_code" => "reservations#destroy", :as => :cancel_reservation
      patch "/reservations/:booking_code" => "reservations#update", :as => :update_reservation
      get "/reservations/:booking_code" => "reservations#show", :as => :reservation
    end
  end
end

entry.title: Rails-home.scss
entry.content:
...

须知

app/assets/stylesheets/home.scss

.issue-list-header {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  background: #f5999d;
  color: #fff;

  .issue-list-heading {
    font-size: 2em;
    font-weight: normal;
  }
}

.align {
  font-family: "museo-sans-condensed";
  font-size: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

.home-banner-links {
  position: absolute;
  left: 160px;
  top: 280px;

  .banner-btn {
    padding: 10px 10px;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    font-weight: 300;
    font-family: "museo-sans-condensed";
    border-radius: 5px;
    color: #fff;
    background: rgba(220, 20, 60, 0.2);
    border: 1px solid transparent;

    &:hover {
      border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    }
  }
}

entry.title: Rails-layout.scss
entry.content:
Page layout.

须知

app/assets/stylesheets/layout.scss

.navbar {
  background: #f49bc1;
  position: relative;
  height: 60px;
  z-index: 1000;

  a {
    color: #fff;
  }

  a:hover {
    color: #ebebeb;
  }
}

.navbar-brand {
  float: left;

  padding-left: 0;
  line-height: 60px;
  font-size: 30px;
}

.nav.left {
  float: left;
  margin-left: 40px;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.nav.right {
  float: right;
}

.nav li {
  float: left;
}

.nav li a {
  display: block;
  font-size: 1.1em;
  padding: 5px 10px;
  margin: 15px 10px;
}

.nav li a:hover {
  color: #000;
  background: #fff;
}

.footer {
  border-top: 1px solid #c5c5c5;
  min-height: 200px;
  margin: 3em 0;
  padding-top: 3em;
  padding-bottom: 3em;
  background: #f8f5f0;
}

.home-banner {
  height: 600px;
}

entry.title: Rails-common.scss
entry.content:
In common.

须知

app/assets/stylesheets/common.scss

body {
  font-family: sans-serif;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: #666;
}

.container {
  width: 1170px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

*,
*:before,
*:after {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.clearfix:before,
.clearfix:after {
  content: " ";
  display: table;
}

.clearfix:after {
  clear: both;
}

.clearfix {
  *zoom: 1;
}

ul {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #f5999d;
}

a:hover {
  color: #845534;
}

.btn-primary {
  color: white;
  background: #f5999d;
  border-color: #f49bc1;

  &:hover {
    background-color: #f49bc1;
    border-color: #845534;
  }
}

.btn {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 1.428571429;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: middle;
  cursor: pointer;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
  border-radius: 4px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  -o-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}

form {
  input {
    font-size: 21px;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px 12px;
    color: #101010;
    border: 1px solid #acacac;
    outline: none
  }

  textarea {
    height: 210px;
    font-size: 21px;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px 12px;
    color: #101010;
    border: 1px solid #acacac;
    outline: none
  }

  label {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    color: #f5999d;
  }

  dd {
    margin: 0;
  }

  .error {
    margin: 5px 0 9px 0;
    color: #DB8A14;
  }
}

.notice {
  position: absolute;
  background: #f5999d;
  right: 50%;
  bottom: 50%;
  color: white;
  padding: 20px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 6px 7px 9px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.68);
  -moz-box-shadow: 6px 7px 9px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.68);
  box-shadow: 6px 7px 9px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.68);
}

td {
  text-align: center;
  height: 40px;
}

th {
  text-align: center;
  height: 30px;
}

entry.title: Rails-Account-CRUD
entry.summary: This means we will modify the basic CRUD SQL statements for each database.
entry.content:
This means we will modify the basic CRUD SQL statements for each database.

0. Rails的控制台

$ rails s
Running via Spring preloader in process 38846
Loading development environment (Rails 6.0.0)
2.6.0 :001 >

1. Create

2.6.0 :001 > a = Account.create(name: "苹果", email: "apple@qq.com")
   (2.0ms)  SET NAMES utf8mb4,  @@SESSION.sql_mode = CONCAT(CONCAT(@@sql_mode, ',STRICT_ALL_TABLES'), ',NO_AUTO_VALUE_ON_ZERO'),  @@SESSION.sql_auto_is_null = 0, @@SESSION.wait_timeout = 2147483
   (0.2ms)  BEGIN
  Account Create (8.4ms)  INSERT INTO `accounts` (`name`, `email`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('苹果', 'apple@qq.com', '2019-09-27 02:03:14.054623', '2019-09-27 02:03:14.054623')
   (1.0ms)  COMMIT
 => #<Account id: 1, name: "苹果", email: "apple@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:03:14", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:03:14"> 

2.6.0 :002 > b = Account.create(name: "男孩", email: "boy@qq.com")
   (0.2ms)  BEGIN
  Account Create (0.4ms)  INSERT INTO `accounts` (`name`, `email`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('男孩', 'boy@qq.com', '2019-09-27 02:06:41.395222', '2019-09-27 02:06:41.395222')
   (0.8ms)  COMMIT
 => #<Account id: 2, name: "男孩", email: "boy@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41">

2.6.0 :003 > c = Account.create(name: "小猫", email: "cat@qq.com")
   (0.2ms)  BEGIN
  Account Create (0.4ms)  INSERT INTO `accounts` (`name`, `email`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('小猫', 'cat@qq.com', '2019-09-27 02:09:02.416938', '2019-09-27 02:09:02.416938')
   (1.6ms)  COMMIT
 => #<Account id: 3, name: "小猫", email: "cat@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:09:02", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:09:02"> 

2.6.0 :004 > d = Account.create(name: "小狗", email: "dog@qq.com")
   (0.2ms)  BEGIN
  Account Create (0.4ms)  INSERT INTO `accounts` (`name`, `email`, `created_at`, `updated_at`) VALUES ('小狗', 'dog@qq.com', '2019-09-27 02:10:01.300719', '2019-09-27 02:10:01.300719')
   (1.5ms)  COMMIT
 => #<Account id: 4, name: "小狗", email: "dog@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01">

2. Read

###（1）查找所有数据

2.6.0 :005 > all = Account.all
  Account Load (5.7ms)  SELECT `accounts`.* FROM `accounts` LIMIT 11
 => #<ActiveRecord::Relation [#<Account id: 1, name: "苹果", email: "apple@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:03:14", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:03:14">, #<Account id: 2, name: "男孩", email: "boy@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41">, #<Account id: 3, name: "小猫", email: "cat@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:09:02", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:09:02">, #<Account id: 4, name: "小狗", email: "dog@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01">]>

###（2）通过id查找数据

2.6.0 :006 > one = Account.find(2)
  Account Load (1.0ms)  SELECT `accounts`.* FROM `accounts` WHERE `accounts`.`id` = 2 LIMIT 1
 => #<Account id: 2, name: "男孩", email: "boy@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:06:41">

(3) 通过条件查找数据

2.6.0 :007 > results = Account.where(name: "小狗")
  Account Load (1.8ms)  SELECT `accounts`.* FROM `accounts` WHERE `accounts`.`name` = '小狗' LIMIT 11
 => #<ActiveRecord::Relation [#<Account id: 4, name: "小狗", email: "dog@qq.com", password: nil, role: nil, status: nil, created_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01", updated_at: "2019-09-27 02:10:01">]>

3. Update（在Read上，再Update）

2.6.0 :008 > Account.find(1).update(name: "小猫猫")
  Account Load (0.4ms)  SELECT `accounts`.* FROM `accounts` WHERE `accounts`.`id` = 1 LIMIT 1
   (0.2ms)  BEGIN
  Account Update (6.5ms)  UPDATE `accounts` SET `accounts`.`name` = '小猫猫', `accounts`.`updated_at` = '2019-09-27 06:35:22.936392' WHERE `accounts`.`id` = 1
   (2.6ms)  COMMIT
 => true 

2.6.0 :009 > Account.where(name: "小狗").update_all(name: "小狗狗")
  Account Update All (3.4ms)  UPDATE `accounts` SET `accounts`.`name` = '小狗狗' WHERE `accounts`.`name` = '小狗'
 => 1

4. Delete（在Read上，再Delete）

2.6.0 :015 > Account.where(name: "小狗狗").delete_all
  Account Destroy (2.6ms)  DELETE FROM `accounts` WHERE `accounts`.`name` = '小狗狗'
 => 1

5. Order（排序）

# 将查询结果根据创建时间正序排序
Account.where(name:"小狗").order(created_at: :asc)
# 将查询结果根据创建时间倒序排序
Account.where(name:"小狗").order(created_at: :desc)
# 将查询结果先根据创建时间倒序排序，再根据修改时间正序排序
Account.where(name:"小狗").order(created_at: :desc,updated_at: :asc)

entry.title: Rails-Account-Migrate
entry.summary: Data Migration is the process of migrating data from one data environment to another.
entry.content:
Data Migration is the process of migrating data from one data environment to another.

tips： 表-命名习惯小写复数，模型-习惯命名大写单数

1. 表结构

表名称：accounts

字段名字 字段说明 字段类型 备注
name 用户名称 string 必填
email 注册邮箱 string 必填
password 密码 string 必填
role 用户角色（控制权限） integer 0普通用户 1管理员 2超级管理员
status 用户状态（是否激活） integer 0已激活 1未激活

2. 迁移文件

$ rails g model Account name:string email:string password:string role:integer status:integer 
Running via Spring preloader in process 39715
      invoke  active_record
      create    db/migrate/20190926015939_create_accounts.rb
      create    app/models/account.rb
      invoke    test_unit
      create      test/models/account_test.rb
      create      test/fixtures/accounts.yml

3. 迁移操作

$ rails db:migrate
== 20190926015939 CreateAccounts: migrating ===================================
-- create_table(:accounts)
   -> 0.0103s
== 20190926015939 CreateAccounts: migrated (0.0104s) ==========================

entry.title: Easy-Swift-2
entry.content:
类是模具，对象是铸件。

Class

class Cat {
	var name: String?
	var age: Int?
}

var kitty = Cat()
kitty.name = "Hello Kitty"
kitty.age = 45

Method

class Cat {

    func sayHello(name:String) -> Bool {
		print("Hello, my name is \(name)")		
		return true
	}
}

var kitty = Cat()
kitty.sayHello(name: "Kitty")

entry.title: Easy-Swift-1
entry.summary: The powerful programming language that is also easy to learn.
entry.content:
The powerful programming language that is also easy to learn.

Variable & Constant

var v = 10
let l = 100

String

var v = "Less is more"
let l = "Less is more"

Array

var letters : String[] = ["A", "B", "C", "D"]

Dictionary

var letters : [String : String] = ["A" : "apple", "B" : "ball", "C" : "cat", "D" : "dog"]

Set

var letter : Set = ["apple", "ball", "cat", "dog"]
